graphql.query:
mutation ($payload:ToolsCreateProcedureInput!)
{
	toolsCreateProcedure (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		name
		type
		version
		isActive
		isUpdated
		upScript
		downScript
		sort
		executedAt
		checkedAt
	}
}

graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	toolsGetProcedures (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		type
		version
		isActive
		isUpdated
		upScript
		downScript
		sort
		executedAt
		checkedAt
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	toolsFindProcedure (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		type
		version
		isActive
		isUpdated
		upScript
		downScript
		sort
		executedAt
		checkedAt
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	toolsFindProcedureById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		name
		type
		version
		isActive
		isUpdated
		upScript
		downScript
		sort
		executedAt
		checkedAt
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($payload:ToolsUpdateProcedureInput!)
{
	toolsUpdateProcedure (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		name
		type
		version
		isActive
		isUpdated
		upScript
		downScript
		sort
		executedAt
		checkedAt
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

graphql.query:
mutation ($id:ID!)
{
	toolsDeleteProcedureById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		name
		type
		version
		isActive
		isUpdated
		upScript
		downScript
		sort
		executedAt
		checkedAt
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	toolsDeleteProcedures (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		type
		version
		isActive
		isUpdated
		upScript
		downScript
		sort
		executedAt
		checkedAt
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}
